mapper.select: SELECT ar.action_id, ar.rule_seq, ar.param_name, ar.param_value, ar.match_operator, ar.description, ar.created_by, ar.created_at, ar.updated_by, ar.updated_at FROM action_rule ar JOIN action a ON a.id = ar.action_id WHERE ar.action_id = #{actionId} AND a.default_rule_type != 'ALL'

INSERT INTO action_rule ( action_id, rule_seq, param_name, param_value, match_operator, description, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{actionId}, COALESCE((SELECT max(rule_seq) FROM action_rule WHERE action_id = #{actionId}), 0) + 1, #{paramName}, #{paramValue}, #{matchOperator}, #{description}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} ) RETURNING *
